item.title: Blues playlist for 12/2012
item.description: Including: Allman Brothers Band, B.B. King, C.W. Stoneking, Freddie King, Gary Clark Jr., James Cotton, Johnny Winter, Rory Gallagher, Screamin' Jay Hawkins, She Caught The Katy.

item.description: Including: 32, Albert King, Gary Clark Jr., J.B. Lenoir, Lightnin Hopkins, Otis Spann, Shakey Graves, Stevie Ray Vaughan, The Beatles, The Coppertone.

item.description: Including: Allman Brothers Band, Big Mama Thornton, David Gilmour, Gary Clark Jr., I'M Lost Without You, Junior Kimbrough, My Babe, T-Bone Walker, The Black Keys, The White Stripes.

item.description: Including: Blues 2.0, Buddy Guy, Charley Patton, Muddy Waters, Otis Redding, Same Old Blues, Stevie Ray Vaughan, The Blues Brothers, Tom Waits, Wilcox Sessions.

item.description: Including: Black Keys, Canned Heat, Duane &Amp; Gregg Allman, John Mayer, Lucille Bogan, Rab Mccullough Blues Band, Skip James, Slow Blues In A Minor, Stevie Ray Vaughan, The Black Keys.
